docs.snippet: The company’s recent quarterly results had lots of good numbers: More users and revenue and a big profit. But time spent on its platforms was the real stunner.

headline.main: Facebook Has Put a Spell on You

docs.snippet: Now that Hillary Clinton has effectively won the Democratic nomination, many of her young supporters can change their status update.

headline.main: Hillary Supporters Can Now ‘Be Public’ on Facebook

docs.abstract: Many Hillary Clinton supporters admit to having felt scorned by outspoken Bernie Sanders fans and say they were reluctant to state their political position on social media before Clinton secured Democratic presidential nomination; describe secret, invite-only Facebook groups that provided sense of community and safe forum for discussion.

docs.snippet: People hoping to send a note to President Barack Obama can now contact the White House using Facebook Messenger, just as they would communicate with their friends.

headline.print_headline: Obama's Reading Will Now Include Facebook Messenger Notes
headline.main: Obama's Reading Will Now Include Facebook Messenger Notes

docs.snippet: Larossi Abballa, who stabbed a police captain and his companion to death, was released almost immediately after his conviction in 2013.

headline.print_headline: Frenchman Kills 2 in ISIS’ Name and Says So Live on Facebook
headline.main: Killing Twice for ISIS and Saying So Live on Facebook

docs.abstract: Frenchman Larossi Abballa fatally stabs police officer and his female companion in town of Magnanville, then posts video of himself on Facebook declaring allegiance to Islamic State; couple's son is rescued following police raid in which Abballa is killed; attacks, coming just after Orlando shooting, illustrate possibility of home-grown extremists acting in name of terrorist organizations in ordinary places, and difficulty of predicting such incidents.

docs.snippet: Facebook responded to a report by the website Gizmodo that accused the social network of suppressing stories from conservative news sources.

headline.print_headline: Political Challenge  to Facebook Claims Bias
headline.main: Conservatives Accuse Facebook of Political Bias

docs.snippet: Facebook rejected on Monday claims made by Germany's state authorities that it was reluctant to co-operate with them on criminal investigations, saying many of the requests it received for user data were incorrectly formulated.

headline.print_headline: Facebook Denies Reluctance to Give Data to German Investigators
headline.main: Facebook Denies Reluctance to Give Data to German Investigators

docs.snippet: If the American anger and dread that fed Trump’s rise are not addressed, the consequences will be dire.

headline.print_headline: Trumpism  after all the dust settles

docs.snippet: Live video is growing more popular as a way for families to share big moments with faraway loved ones and for artists and athletes to connect with fans.

headline.print_headline: At a Glance: Livestreaming Apps Beyond Facebook Live
headline.main: At a Glance: Livestreaming Apps Beyond Facebook Live

docs.snippet: The most powerful force in the news industry just said something that should shock everyone in the media business: Its primary purpose isn’t informing users about the world.

headline.print_headline: The News Behemoth That Put News Last
headline.main: Facebook, a News Giant That Would Rather Show Us Baby Pictures

docs.abstract: Farhad Manjoo State of the Art column ponders Facebook’s insistence it was never meant to be major news source, but instead place to find updates on friends and family; notes social media giant’s revelations, along with its recent partnerships with media firms, counter research indicating platform has become popular and important source of global news.

docs.snippet: Authorities in Virginia have arrested a man wanted in a triple shooting that one of the victims recorded on Facebook Live.

headline.print_headline: Man Charged in Triple Shooting Recorded on Facebook Live
headline.main: Man Charged in Triple Shooting Recorded on Facebook Live
